943910.name: Delta Horizon - Supporter Pack
943910.description:
Welcome to the Delta Horizon Supporter Pack! This DLC gives you in-game swag for the people who want to support the developer. If you like what you see and want to see the game improve quicker, pick up this pack and show that you care and start fragging with some extra style!

The Supporter Pack includes the following:

- Exclusive Spec Ops Soldier Skin and Color variant.

- Access to the initial weapon cosmetics.

- Additional flair in the future.
943910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
